rows.label: qev075301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, good timing! I was just about to pack up and
leave New LA. Glad I ran into you before then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask where Gi Zang's journey will take him next.

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask why Gi Zang is leaving the city.

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0002
rows.name:
You are curious? Guess I am not surprised.
You seem like the type who likes to travel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0003
rows.name: Methinks I shall head across the sea to Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Even that crazy Prone shouldn't follow if I can get that
far away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0005
rows.name: ...Hmm? What Prone? Oh, it's a long story.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0006
rows.name:
The short version is that he has been following me
around trying to convince me to take him on as a
student.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0007
rows.name:
He's certainly thorough. Morning, noon, and night,
he's literally been on his knees begging me.
My training has suffered greatly as a result.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0008
rows.name:
I appreciate your concern. I've had a strange Prone
following me around of late, and haven't been able to
carry out my normal training as a result.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0009
rows.name:
I have turned him down a hundred times over,
but he keeps begging me to take him on as a student.
Literally begging. On his knees. All day long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0010
rows.name:
I am hoping that if I run away to Sylvalum, I may
finally achieve some peace and return to my training.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0011
rows.name:
Would you like to come with me, my friend?
We could have an adventure worthy of a song![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0012
rows.name:
And I'm sure that running into you just before I leave
is more than coincidence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0013
rows.name:
I've heard tale of a ridiculously tough indigen called the
jacul rage out there. It should be the perfect place to
test our skills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0014
rows.name:
Perfect! Then let us leave the city before that Prone
sees us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Once we get to Sylvalum, we'll race to see who can
take down a jacul rage first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0016
rows.name:
I wager you're pretty confident when it comes to
hunting indigens, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0031
rows.name: Reply that hunting is your forte.

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Gi Zang that you've never been much of a hunter.

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0017
rows.name:
I knew it. Your focus during combat is incredible.
No quarry is escaping from you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0018
rows.name:
That said, I'm no slouch either. I grew up in the woods,
after all—there's no wild animal I can't handle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0019
rows.name:
For true? I didn't imagine there was any task at which
you did not excel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Though I'll grant that hunting wild animals is a very
different thing than engaging a foe in combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0021
rows.name:
Mayhap that gives me the advantage this time around.
I grew up in the woods after all—there is no wild
creature I cannot handle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0022
rows.name: Ah, I found you! Gi Zang? Master? Helloooo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0023
rows.name: Damnation. He has seen me. I must fly, my friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0024
rows.name:
I shall meet you at Lake Ciel in Sylvalum.
Do not make me wait![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0025
rows.name: Ah. Hello, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0026
rows.name:
*sigh* Well, he found me. Even this far-removed place
was not distant enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0027
rows.name:
And here I was, ready and eager to test my skills
against a jacul rage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0028
rows.name:
Then I come too, Master!
We destroy it together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0029
rows.name:
How many times do I have to tell you?
I am not your master. I am no one's master![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0030
rows.name:
In the name of all that is honorable and good,
you must let this go. It matters not what you say—
I'm not taking on any students![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0031
rows.name:
I don't care what you say, Master.
You must teach me to fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0032
rows.name: ...Ah! Earth alien![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0033
rows.name:
Help me, Earth alien. Tell Master how serious I am.
I came so far![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0050
rows.name: Persuade

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0051
rows.name: Speak to Gi Zang on Tolba's behalf.

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0060
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Gi Zang why he can't take a student.

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0034
rows.name:
Don't YOU start!
Do you not remember what I told you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0035
rows.name:
I am the last of the Hundred Hellions—we pass down
our style from parent to child. I am allowed but one
student in my life, and that one is named my successor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0036
rows.name:
Did I not tell you of this? The Hundred Hellions pass on
their style from parent to child.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0037
rows.name:
I can have but a single student in my lifetime,
and that one is named my successor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0038
rows.name:
This Prone is weak and flabby—the training would kill
him before it could begin. To even consider it would
be an insult to my grandfather AND his sword![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0039
rows.name:
You know this Prone, do you not? Then for his sake,
speak to him. He must abandon this foolishness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0070
rows.name: Persuade

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0071
rows.name: Try to convince Tolba to abandon his plan.

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0080
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Tolba why he's so set on being Gi Zang's student.

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0040
rows.name: I cannot give up. I never want to feel that way again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0041
rows.name: I will tell. Then I hope you will help me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0042
rows.name:
My mother died when we came to Mira.
Killed by Ganglion scum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0043
rows.name:
They killed her while I watched. I could do nothing.
They held me down as I cried from fear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0044
rows.name:
I am weak. But I want to be strong.
I want to be protect everyone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0045
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0046
rows.name:
Is that enough, Master? If not, so be it. I will leave.
But let me see you fight once more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0047
rows.name:
I will remember it forever. Make you master of my soul.
Then I will train alone. Learn to fight alone.
Soon I will be strong like you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0048
rows.name: You watched as they killed your parent?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0049
rows.name: I feel as if I've heard that before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0050
rows.name:
Very well. Out of respect for you and your mother,
I shall give this fight everything that I have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0051
rows.name:
You don't mind, right, [ST:playername ]?
It's just... I know what this one has been through.
I want to do what I can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0090
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0091
rows.name: Wordlessly ready yourself for combat.

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0100
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0101
rows.name:
Exclaim that you're not a trained bear who
puts on shows for the amusement of others.

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0052
rows.name:
A warrior to the core.
I forget that you give your all to every fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0053
rows.name: A SHOW?! This is no band of traveling players![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0054
rows.name:
This is a serious duel, fought to a hair's breadth shy of
death itself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0055
rows.name:
I am Gi Zang, last survivor of the Hundred Hellions
and inheritor of my master's sword. I draw it now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0056
rows.name:
Watch close, Tolba. This is how a man who shares
your pain fights![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0076
rows.name: Gah...hah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0077
rows.name: ...[ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0078
rows.name:
This is...so pathetic. I was bested...
I could not protect what mattered to me yet again...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0079
rows.name:
Sorry, but...I do not think I shall be moving any time
soon. The jacul rage is ahead... Take my...revenge...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0080
rows.name: The jacul rage is...ahead... Hrgh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0081
rows.name: You have returned. Did you slay it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0082
rows.name: ...Thank you. Now hopefully Tolba can be in peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0083
rows.name:
...Damn my eyes! Of course he's not at peace!
What peace can he know with his mother unavenged?
Such anger and regret does not end at death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0084
rows.name:
It is...my fault. I wasn't strong enough.
I let another one die...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0151
rows.name: Tell Gi Zang that he has the right of it.

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0160
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0161
rows.name:
Tell Gi Zang that there was nothing
anyone could have done.

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0085
rows.name:
You really are like my grandfather, friend.
Were he alive, he would have laid into me as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0086
rows.name:
How are you that strong AND that compassionate?
I don't think I've ever met your like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0087
rows.name:
But my grandfather always said that in war, there is
no such thing as something that cannot be helped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0088
rows.name:
He said that we are responsible for the lives of all
we have sworn to protect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0089
rows.name:
There is no way I can make this up to him.
But at least I can carry that responsibility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0090
rows.name:
I can cast everything but my training aside,
grow stronger, and kill every last Ganglion that still
draws breath![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0170
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0171
rows.name: Praise Gi Zang for his determination.

rows.label: qev075301_JNK0180
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev075301_SEL0181
rows.name:
Tell Gi Zang not to become a
prisoner to his own hatred.

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0091
rows.name: I'm glad I opened up to you. Told you everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0092
rows.name:
I am not an especially smart or visionary Wrothian.
Revenge is the only way I know to offer comfort to
those who have died.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0093
rows.name:
Is this wrong? Right now, the inside of my head is a
blood red mess of confusion and anger.
I don't even know what...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0094
rows.name:
Well, it won't get any clearer by sitting here.
I need to move around. Get to work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075301_MSG0095
rows.name:
I will take my leave now. ...Oh, and here.
It's not much, but please take it.[ST:wait ]
